Summary: Very Bright Round White Object Hovered in Sky and slowly disappeared behind mountain.
divs: Sighting Details I'd been watching out the window and saw an object and thought it was the brightest star in the sky and it was flickering and watched it about an hour and noticed it had dropped and I woke my girlfriend and we both went outside and I started to try to film it but my camera settings were messed up and the date--I hadn't changed the date, but it was showing the night before and I could not turn off live view. But I got it figured out where I could at least film it 23 minutes until it went behind the mountain--the video is high quality although I need to get a tripod today because it is difficult to hold my arms still. The Pictures I snapped are not good. My girlfriend grabbed the binoculars and also saw it. The video is 2 gigs and too large to upload. This is the second night in a row I saw and filmed this at approximately the same time. The photos are not a good quality like the film, but show a very bright object in the sky.
